name: Medieval Survival
description:
Medieval Survival is a first-person shooter where enemies are waiting for you at every turn, and waves of monsters are generated one by one. Try to hold on as long as possible!
It is a game that will immerse you in the most incredible events: it's a different world and completely different time. There are inconceivable events exciting the mind: monsters captured the medieval city, the player must find a suitable weapon in these dead ancient places and destroy all evil spirits.
Face with death, good luck in this complex case!
